original_text: “His master replied, ‘Well done, good and faithful servant! You have been faithful with a few things; I will put you in charge of many things. Come and share your master’s happiness!’
korean_text: 그 주인이 이르되 잘하였도다 착하고 충성된 종아 네가 적은 일에 충성하였으매 내가 많은 것을 네게 맡기리니 네 주인의 즐거움에 참여할지어다 하고

sentences.original_text: You have been faithful with a few things
I will put you in charge of many things
Come and share your master's happiness
sentences.korean_translation: 와서 네 주인의 기쁨에 함께 참여하라
